English: BitcoinZ is the future of cryptocurrency. Welcome to decentralization.
Slovenian: BitcoinZ je prihodnost kriptovalut. Dobrodošli v decentralizaciji.

English:
- Backup your wallet in many locations
- Store big amount of coins in cold wallets in anonymous addresses
- Don't give / send anyone your private keys. Private keys needs to be secured. You can recover your wallets. If you give or send anyone your private key please consider it as a red flag and quickly move your coins to other address
Slovenian:
- Ustvarite varnostne kopije denarnic na več lokacijah.
- Večje vsote kovancev shranjujte v hladni denarnici (cold wallet).
- Svojega privat ključa ne pošiljajte nikomur. Biti mora zavarovan, da lahko obnovite svojo denarnico. Če komurkoli pošljete svoj privaten ključ prosimo, da razmislite o prenosu kovancev na drugi naslov.

English:
- Bitcoin technology
- Anonymous transactions (zk-SNARKs privacy)
- Bitcoin has all transactions publicly available.
- decentralized GPU mining (ASIC miners are banned, hardforks to prevent ASIC miners are allowed)
- Decentralized development / All contributors are volunteers
- Big blocks -> blocks are similar to BCC / BCH
Slovenian:
- Bitcoin tehnologija
- Anonimne transakcije (zk-SNARKs privacy)
- Bitcoin ima vse transakcije javno dostopne.
- decentralizirano GPU rudarjenje (ASIC rudarji so izključeni, "hardforks" za preprečevanje ASIC rudarjenja so dovoljeni)
- Decentraliziran razvoj / Vsi sodelujoči so prostovoljci
- Veliki bloki -> bloki so podobni BCC / BCH

English:
Our community is active and we are always developing.
You can follow us in social networks, on the forum, as well as Slack
Slovenian:
Naša skupnost je aktivna in se konstantno razvija.
Sledite nam lahko na socialnih omrežjih, na forumih in tudi na Slacku

English: Our goal is to port all best free software on the market to be able to use in BitcoinZ.
Slovenian: Naš cilj je, da lahko za BitcoinZ uporabite najboljšo brezplačno programsko opremo na trgu.

English:
Immutable params:

- max supply

- inflation

- only POW algo - we may change Equihash algo to other POW algo to prevent ASIC miners

- new features are allowed to improve usage / scalability, but we will never change history (ETH/ETC case)
Slovenian:
Nepremostljivi parametri:

- Največja ponudba

- inflacija

- samo POW algo - lahko zamenjamo Equihash algo v drugi POW algo da preprečimo ASIC rudarjenje

-nove funkcije omogočajo izboljšanje uporabe / razširljivosti, vendar ne bomo nikoli spremenili zgodovine (primer ETH/ETC)

English:
• Algo: Equihash (always GPU mining - we promote decentralization in mining)
  • Max supply 21B coins
  • Current supply: 12,500 coins every 2.5 minutes
  • Current block size is similar to BCC/BCH (BTCZ = 2MB every 2.5 mins ~ BCC/BCH = 8MB every 10 min)
Slovenian:
• Algo: Equihash (samo GPU rudarjenje- promoviramo decentralizacijo v rudarjenju)
  • Maksimalna zaloga 21B kovancev
  • Trenutna zaloga: 12,500 kovancev vsakih 2.5 minut
  • trenutna velikost bloka je podobna BCC/BCH (BTCZ = 2MB vsakih 2.5 min~ BCC/BCH = 8MB vsakih 10 min)

English: We are a fully decentralized network
Our wallet is compatible with Linux, Windows, iOS and Android.
Slovenian: Denarnica je kompatibilne z Linux, Windows, iOS in Android.

English: We listen to our dear community, so we can succeed.
Slovenian: Prisluhnimo naši skupnost, zato lahko skupaj uspemo.

English: BitcoinZ is focused on organic growth.
Slovenian: BitcoinZ je osredotočen na organsko rast.

English: Buy or sell your BitcoinZ coins
Slovenian: Kupi ali prodaj svoj BitcoinZ kovance

English: WARNING: Always remember about the pitfalls and keep your backup keys in a safe place!
Slovenian: OPOZORILO: Vedno pomislite na pasti in hranite varnostne ključe na varnem mestu!

English:
As a miner you should not use the biggest pools to follow main principles.
Easy to mine
Equihash algorithm.
Decentralized Exchanges
Slovenian:
Kot rudar ne smete uporabljati največjih Poolov.
Preprosto rudarjenje
Equihash algoritem.
Decentralizirane izmenjave

English: 21 billion coins! Everyone in the world can have at least one BTCZ!
Slovenian: 21 billion kovancev! Vsak zemljan ima lahko vsaj en BTCZ!

English: Our community is actively developing and growing every day.
Slovenian: Naša skupnost se aktivno razvija in raste vsak dan.

English: All transactions remain anonymous. So you do not have to worry about anonymity.
Slovenian: Vse transkacije so anonimne. Lahko ste brez skrbi za vašo anonoimnost.

English: You can use BitcoinZ coins in your smartphones.
Slovenian: BitcoinZ kovance lahko uporabljate na vaših pametnih telefonih.

English: Your coin will grow and develop in a natural way.
Slovenian: Vaši kovanci bodo rasli in se razvijali po naravni poti.

English: All exchanges are allowed. The best ones are decentralized. We plan to implement fully decentralized XCAT exchange.
Slovenian: Vse kripto borze so dovoljene. Najbolše so decentralizirane. Planiramo razvoj decentralizirane XCAT kripto borze.

English: The coin is calculated only for POW mining, and will never be changed to POS
Slovenian: Kovanci so računani na podlagi POW rudarjenja, in ne bodo nikoli spremenjeni v POS
